```{r}
sumall <- function(x, y) {
  add = x + y
  sub = x - y
  mul = x * y
  div = x / y
  return(list(addition = add , subtraction = sub, multiplication = mul, division = div))
}


result = sumall(2, 3)
print(result$subtraction)


```

```{r}
# 11: Write a function in R to check whether x is even or odd.

checkx = function(x){
  if(x %% 2 == 0){
    cat({x}, "is a even number")
  }else{
    cat({x}, "is not even but odd number")
  }
}

number = checkx(4)
print(number())
```
